result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Amber Rose Leggett

records.addlTxt: Indigency hearing on November 17, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Calendar call on November 23, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft was present and excused. Atty Mathie appears. 
Deft does not qualify for SPD representation in 22CM467 & 22CM597. 
Indigency Hearing and Calendar Call set.
Calendar call scheduled for November 23, 2022 at 01:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Amber Rose Leggett
Current: 219960 Hwy H, Edgar, WI 54426 United States  (Effective: 10-04-2022)
Prior: 219960 County Road H, Edgar, WI 54426

Clerk: Heather. 
Case called: 2:35 p.m. 
INCLUDES: 21CM1294, 22CM267, 22CM467, 22CM597. 
State appears by ADA Alex Lech.  Defendant appears from MCJ via Zoom, with Atty Heather Roehr, in person.

Date and time set for initial appearance and warrant quash. VRCW.  
COURT QUASHES WARRANT. 
Reading Waived.  Reserve Jurisdiction. 
Court questions deft re: complaint and rights.
Advised Right of Counsel. 
PLEA: NOT GUILTY on CM's

COURT ORDERS: $500.00 signature bond to cover all files. 

CONDITIONS: 
- No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores, or Beer Tents. 
- Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  
- No driving without valid DL. 
- Report to ATTIC Corrections Services within one business day of release.  Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level 4 supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.  
-These conditions in addition to original conditions ordered in 21CM1294 and 22CM267. 

DATES:
PTC W/JA: 10/31/22 @ 2:20 p.m. Br. 3. 

Adjourned: 2:39 p.m.

INCLUDES 21CM1294, 22CM267, 22CM467 & 22CM597.  No contact with victim(s): DM.  Contact includes direct personal or physical and indirect contact by phone, in writing of any kind, entry to the person's residence or place of employment together with contacts through other persons.  Contact, however, may be made through the defendant's attorney.  Police (MNSO) escort to retrieve personal property.  No Bars, Taverns, Liquor Stores or Beer Tents.  Absolute sobriety from and no possession of alcohol/controlled substances except prescriptions taken as prescribed.  Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.  Report to ATTIC Corrections Services (715-848-3202) within one business day of release. Comply with pretrial monitoring through ATTIC Correctional Services at Level (4) supervision with possible drug testing as determined by agency screening.
$30.00 warrant fee. Brought to jail 09/30/22 by Mosinee PD.

Clerk: Heather.
Case Called: 9:26 a.m. 
INCLUDES: 21CM1294, 22CM267, 22CM467, 22CM597.
State appears by ADA Rory McGarry; Deft FAILS to appear, with Atty John Mathie. 

COURT notes due to non appearance, warrant to remain and bond forfeiture will be continued. 

Adjourned: 9:27 a.m.
Re: For BFH on 9/23 (Not Deliverable as Addressed: 116 South 17th Ave #138, Wausau, WI 54401)
Bail/Bond Forfeiture Hearing on September 23, 2022 at 09:00 am.

Case Called: 3:10 pm
INCLUDES 21CM1294, 22CM267, 22CM597, 22CM467.
Clerk: Kassidi.
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher for ADA Kerri Puig. Defendant does not appear. Atty Jack Mathie appears in person on behalf of the Defendant.
VRCW.
Date and time set for an Initial Appearance/Voluntary Appearance.
COURT AUTHORIZES BW $50.00 in each of 21CM1294 & 22CM267. 
DATES:
BFH 09/23 @ 9:00 am
Adjourned: 3:14 pm

Clerk: Becca. 
Case Called: 9:27 am. 
INCLUDES: 22CM597 & 22CM467.
BRANCH 3 CASES.

State appears by ADA Cody Marschall and ADA Ben Vechinski for ADA Keri Puig. 
Defendant fails to appear.  

BENCH WARRANT IN 22CM467 to continue.
COURT ORDERS BWA: $500.00 in 22CM597.

Adjourned: 9:27 am.

Clerk Marisa.
Case Called: 10:28 am 
INCLUDES 22CM597 & 22CM467. 
State appears by ADA Kerri Puig; Deft does NOT appear. 
COURT authorizes $500 bench warrant in 22CM467. 
COURT continues IA in 22CM597 to 8/1/2022. 
Adj: 10:29 am
